### Coverage Results

```{python}
#| echo: false

if "RDD" in category_results and category_results["RDD"]["regular"]:
    df_rdd = pd.DataFrame(category_results["RDD"]["regular"])
    df_rdd_sorted = df_rdd.sort_values(["Deviation"])

    # Format coverage rate and prepare display
    display_df = df_rdd_sorted[["Model Type", "Effect", "Coverage Rate", "Status", "Repetitions", "DoubleML Version", "Last Modified"]].copy()
    display_df["Coverage Rate"] = display_df["Coverage Rate"].apply(lambda x: f"{x:.3f}")

    display(style_summary_table(display_df, is_sensitivity=False))
else:
    print("No RDD coverage results found.")
```
